character.name: Aiden

edges.name: Luck
edges.description: Starts each session with an extra Benny.

items: Star Trek: The Experience name badge
character.notes: Skills inherit die type from linked attributes. Specialization Edges can increase skills +1 die type.

hindrances.name: Curious
hindrances.description: Must make a Smarts roll to resist investigating something interesting or unusual.

hindrances.name: Overconfident
hindrances.description: Believes he can handle any situation, leading to risky decisions.

character.name: Patience Cooper

edges.name: Healer
edges.description: +2 to Healing rolls and can cure diseases with a raise.

edges.name: Healing Specialization
edges.description: Healing skill increased by +1 die type (d8)

items: Well-worn Bible with pressed Hawaiian medicinal plants
character.notes: Skills inherit die type from linked attributes. Specialization Edges can increase skills +1 die type.

weapons.name: Walking Stick
weapons.notes: Carved from koa wood, doubles as medical splint

hindrances.name: Habit (Major)
hindrances.description: Her vow to help others is compulsive, requiring her to aid anyone in need, even at great personal risk.

hindrances.name: Lame
hindrances.description: Her leprosy has worsened, reducing her Pace by 2.

hindrances.name: Death Wish
hindrances.description: She believes her time is limited and takes dangerous risks to do good.

character.name: Lotte St. John

edges.name: Attractive
edges.description: +2 to Persuasion rolls against those who might find her appealing.

edges.name: Style
edges.description: +2 to any roll made with a benny.

character.notes: Skills inherit die type from linked attributes. Specialization Edges can increase skills +1 die type.

weapons.name: Obsidian blade
weapons.notes: Fragile: Breaks on 1 on Fighting die

hindrances.name: Arrogant
hindrances.description: -2 to Support rolls; +2 to enemy Taunt rolls vs her

hindrances.name: Habit (Minor)
hindrances.description: Must make Smarts roll to resist luxury purchases

hindrances.name: Secret
hindrances.description: -2 to Persuasion if working-class roots revealed

character.name: Kojak

edges.name: Woodsman
edges.description: +2 to Survival in natural environments and +2 to Stealth while in wilderness settings.

edges.name: Beast Bond
edges.description: +2 to Handle Animal and Riding rolls. Can take a raccoon or hummingbird as an animal companion.

character.notes:
Got trapped on a spaceship with 2 different timelines / crews

FIND THE CAPTAIN

-You've seen a hologram of him

We did a big Cyberpunk adventure, got a makeover, watched Matrix 2, went to a party, met head of engineering, fought a huge robot in the reactor core.

Blackwell stole my spear to power future-Dayton. He wants to stop the older version of himself from making 4 big changes:

-Killed Neanderthals

-Killed Alexander the Great

  • -Helped Allies win World War 2

  • -Prevented Alien Contact but caused the fall of Water Moon

I am Wearing

Bulletproof Vest

Conquistador Hat

I made friends with a Utahraptor named Fido

Captain pulled 5 people, but there are four of us, and he has escaped into time.

Talking to Chak-- Dinosaur Handler: He's been chomped up pretty good over three months. They have a triceratops

We are headed into the tunnels with Balam- Sneaky but drunk

I can make TRAIN WHISTLE SOUND.

weapons.name: Electro Spear
weapons.notes: A futuristic spear that can deliver an electric shock

hindrances.name: Loyal
hindrances.description: Kojak will never betray or abandon his allies, even when it puts him at risk.

hindrances.name: Outsider
hindrances.description: -2 to Persuasion rolls with those outside his tribe.
